message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling you this product. I believe it has the potential to be incredibly valuable for you. To kick things off, I'm offering it to you for $1,150,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for the best possible deal. While your offer is appreciated, the value of this product is significantly higher.  I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. This is my final offer.
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go above $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,050,000. This is my final counteroffer.
